divs: Sighting DetailsI was exiting the 5 freeway north at Valencia Blvd. in the City of Valencia,California. I was viewing a construction site to the west of the intersection asit appeared to have something hanging high over it. The object was at a heightthat was far too high for a crane, but not high enough for an airliner. About1,500 feet altitude. The object was like a 727 airliner without wings or a tail.I watched it as I turned eastbound onto Valencia and it remained stationary inthe air. I figured that the stationary illusion of the craft was a product ofreflection of the sunlight. However, it remained. I looked for a tail and wings,but it was apparent that there were none. I cannot guarantee that glare did notblock out these aspects. However, the odd thing was that the object remainedstationary.I am a practicing attorney who has absolutely no incentive to be labeled as someUFO freak and an amateur astronomer. Though I wear glasses, my corrcted eyesightis excellent.The morning gloom had burned off and the sky was hazy. In astronomy terms, theseeing was probably a 62B to 72B. There were no cloud formations in the sky.The object remained as such for approximately a minute and a half. After Iturned, I still had a visual on it. i looked forward, then back and it was gone.It was no where in the sky.This observation should probably be used as corroboration of any other versusprima facie evidence of a sighting.
